item.title: Jordan Melo M7
item.itunes:author: Jordan Brand
item.itunes:subtitle: Shoe Feature Tour
item.itunes:summary: Carmelo Anthony's seventh signature shoe features uni-body construction, Zoom/Max Air and a flex-tuned outsole for his relentless, all-around game.
item.description: Carmelo Anthony's seventh signature shoe features uni-body construction, Zoom/Max Air and a flex-tuned outsole for his relentless, all-around game.
item.itunes:keywords: Jordan, Melo, Carmelo Anthony, M7, shoes, basketball, performance

item.title: Jordan Pure J

item.itunes:summary: Custom fit and feel in performance hoops kicks for players ready to push their game further.

item.title: Jordan Take Flight
item.itunes:author: Jordan Brand
item.itunes:subtitle: Shoe Feature Tour
item.itunes:summary: Superior cushioning and high-performance impact protection arrive in the first Jordans to feature Max Air cushioning.
item.description: Superior cushioning and high-performance impact protection arrive in the first Jordans to feature Max Air cushioning.
item.itunes:keywords: Jordan Take Flight, basketball, hoops, footwear, performance, Max Air

item.title: Jordan Alpha Trunner
item.itunes:author: Jordan Brand
item.itunes:subtitle: Shoe Feature Tour
item.itunes:summary: A tribute to the original Trunning line designed to meet both the training and running needs of today's high-octane athletes.
